sentence.text: These results imply that PPI might be modulated by four genotypes - COMT rs4680 (primarily in males), GRIK3 rs1027599, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II rs9960767, and PRODH rs385440 - indicating a role of these gene variations in the development of early information processing deficits in schizophrenia.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
